params.instruction_str: Are the underlined prepositions right or wrong? Correct them where necessary.

params.instruct_panel_str: If you are unsure about how the animation above works click the "Instructions" button for help

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>
mcq_xml.multiAnswerFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="score"/><text> out of </text><val id="total"/><text> correct.</text>
mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.start_text: We spend two weeks at a lovely cottage <u>in</u> the west coast of Ireland every summer.
question.correct_text: We spend two weeks at a lovely cottage on the west coast of Ireland every summer.
question.modelAnswerString: We spend two weeks at a lovely cottage on the west coast of Ireland every summer.

question.start_text: Jason has breakfast <u>at</u> a small café on his way to work every morning.
question.correct_text: Jason has breakfast at a small café on his way to work every morning.
question.modelAnswerString:
Jason has breakfast at a small café on his way to work every morning.
No change was necessary

question.start_text: I'm afraid your name is not <u>on</u> the list so you can't come in.
question.correct_text: I'm afraid your name is not on the list so you can't come in.
question.modelAnswerString:
I'm afraid your name is not on the list so you can't come in.
No change was necessary

question.start_text: Mike and Jenny left London to live <u>at</u> a farm in the country.
question.modelAnswerString: Mike and Jenny left London to live on a farm in the country.
question.correct_text: Mike and Jenny left London to live on a farm in the country.

question.start_text: My contact details are <u>at</u> the bottom of every email I send.
question.correct_text: My contact details are at the bottom of every email I send.
question.modelAnswerString:
My contact details are at the bottom of every email I send.
No change was necessary

question.start_text: There were no seats left so we stood <u>in</u> the back of the hall to hear the lecture.
question.correct_text: There were no seats left so we stood at the back of the hall to hear the lecture.
question.modelAnswerString: There were no seats left so we stood at the back of the hall to hear the lecture.

question.start_text: The bathroom is <u>on</u> the top of the stairs on your right.
question.correct_text: The bathroom is at the top of the stairs on your right.
question.modelAnswerString: The bathroom is at the top of the stairs on your right.

question.start_text: Helen explained how she felt <u>in</u> a letter to Ronald.
question.correct_text: Helen explained how she felt in a letter to Ronald.
question.modelAnswerString:
Helen explained how she felt in a letter to Ronald.
No change was necessary

question.start_text: The police caught the robber because he was <u>on</u> a photograph taken at the time of the robbery.
question.correct_text: The police caught the robber because he was in a photograph taken at the time of the robbery.
question.modelAnswerString: The police caught the robber because he was in a photograph taken at the time of the robbery.

question.start_text: During the airshow there were no clouds <u>in</u> the sky, so we had a perfect view.
question.correct_text: During the airshow there were no clouds in the sky, so we had a perfect view.
question.modelAnswerString:
During the airshow there were no clouds in the sky, so we had a perfect view.
No change was necessary
